about.me: We are a private, independent Cardano Stake Pool Operator (SPO) based in California, USA. It is our mission to support a global ecosystem that is eco-friendly, transparent, efficient, reliable, and sustainable.
about.server: Proxmox Server self hosted with backup site coming soon. Our equipment currently consists of 1 Block Producer and 1 Relay Nodes (2nd coming soon). We can guarantee an excellent internet connection. BARE METAL SERVERS
